topic_name: Why did the iconic Stegosaurus have plates and spikes?
og_name: Why did the iconic Stegosaurus have plates and spikes?
og_description: Stegosaurus is one of the most easily recognizable dinosaurs, in part due to the plates and spikes on its back and tail. But their function remains a bit of a mystery – or so Susannah Maidment tells us.
